citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:03 pm on
11-Mar-19.
Upon arrival the front gate to the facility was closed and locked. Attempted to contact license by phone and left
message. Departed facility at 12:30 pm. Returned to facility at 1:00 pm. Front gate was closed and locked.
Attempted to contact license by phone and left message. Business card was left on the front gate. Departed facility
at 1:07 pm.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:03 pm on
11-Mar-19.
Upon arrival the front gate to the facility was closed and locked.  Attempted to contact license by phone and left
message.  Departed facility at 12:30 pm.  Returned to facility at 1:00 pm.  Front gate was closed and locked. 
Attempted to contact license by phone and left message.  Business card was left on the front gate.  Departed facility
at 1:07 pm.
